member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.SnapshotByTimeOffsetTemplate.FillType
member.summary:
The fill mode, or the way of processing a screenshot when the configured aspect ratio is different from that of the source video. Valid values:
stretch: Stretch the image frame by frame to fill the entire screen. The video image may become "squashed" or "stretched" after transcoding.
black: Keep the image's original aspect ratio and fill the blank space with black bars.
white: Keep the image’s original aspect ratio and fill the blank space with white bars.
gauss: Keep the image’s original aspect ratio and apply Gaussian blur to the blank space. Default value: black.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.SplitMediaTaskInput.FileId
member.summary: Video ID.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.SplitMediaTaskInput.StartTimeOffset
member.summary:
Offset of the video splitting start time in seconds.
If this parameter is left empty or set to 0, the transcoded video will start at the same time as the original video.
If this parameter is set to a positive number (n for example), the transcoded video will start at the nth second of the original video.
If this parameter is set to a negative number (-n for example), the transcoded video will start at the nth second before the end of the original video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.SplitMediaTaskInput.EndTimeOffset
member.summary:
Offset of the video splitting end time in seconds.
If this parameter is left empty or set to 0, the transcoded video will end at the same time as the original video.
If this parameter is set to a positive number (n for example), the transcoded video will end at the nth second of the original video.
If this parameter is set to a negative number (-n for example), the transcoded video will end at the nth second before the end of the original video.

member.summary: Output information of a video splitting task.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StatDataItem.Time
member.summary:
Start time of data time range in [ISO date format](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/266/11732?from_cn_redirect=1#I). For example, if the time granularity is 1-day, `2018-12-01T00:00:00+08:00` represents the time range between December 1, 2018 (inclusive) and December 2, 2018 (not inclusive).
For data at hourly level, `2019-08-22T00:00:00+08:00` indicates the statistics between 00:00 and 01:00 AM on August 22, 2019.
For data at daily level, `2019-08-22T00:00:00+08:00` indicates statistics on August 22, 2019.

Source of media material for sticker segment, which can be:

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.Duration
member.summary: Sticker duration in seconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.StartTime
member.summary: Start time of sticker on track in seconds.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.CoordinateOrigin
member.summary:
Origin position. Valid values:
Center: the origin of coordinates is the center position, such as the center of canvas. Default value: Center.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.XPos
member.summary:
The horizontal position of the origin of the sticker relative to the origin of the canvas. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `XPos` of the sticker will be at the position of the specified percentage of the canvas width; for example, `10%` means that `XPos` is 10% of the canvas width.
If the string ends in px, the `XPos` of the sticker will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `XPos` is 100 px. Default value: 0 px.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.YPos
member.summary:
The vertical position of the origin of the sticker relative to the origin of the canvas. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `YPos` of the sticker will be at the position of the specified percentage of the canvas height; for example, `10%` means that `YPos` is 10% of the canvas height.
If the string ends in px, the `YPos` of the sticker will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `YPos` is 100 px. Default value: 0 px.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.Width
member.summary:
Sticker width. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `Width` of the sticker will be the specified percentage of the canvas width; for example, `10%` means that `Width` is 10% of the canvas width.
If the string ends in px, the `Width` of the sticker will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `Width` is 100 px.
If both `Width` and `Height` are empty, then they will be the `Width` and `Height` of the sticker material, respectively.
If `Width` is empty (0), but `Height` is not empty, `Width` will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not empty, but `Height` is empty, `Height` will be proportionally scaled.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.StickerTrackItem.Height
member.summary:
Sticker height. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `Height` of the sticker will be the specified percentage of the canvas height; for example, `10%` means that `Height` is 10% of the canvas height.
If the string ends in px, the `Height` of the sticker will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `Height` is 100 px.
If both `Width` and `Height` are empty, then they will be the `Width` and `Height` of the sticker material, respectively.
If `Width` is empty, but `Height` is not empty, `Width` will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not empty, but `Height` is empty, `Height` will be proportionally scaled.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.SvgWatermarkInputForUpdate.Width
P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.SvgWatermarkInputForUpdate.CycleConfig
member.summary: Watermark cycle configuration, which is used to configure watermarks so that they will be displayed and hidden periodically. Primary use case: watermarks can be added at various positions in a video, which are displayed and hidden periodically to prevent them from being covered. For example, watermarks A, B, C, and D are set in the top-left corner, top-right corner, bottom-right corner, and bottom-left corner of a video, respectively. After the first video frame, { A will be displayed for 5s -> B for 5s -> C for 5s -> D for 5s } -> A for 5s -> B for 5s -> ... Only one watermark will be visible at any time. Within the braces ({}) is a major cycle composed of four watermarks, namely, A, B, C, and D, which lasts for 20 seconds in a cycle. Watermarks A, B, C, and D are displayed periodically for 5 seconds and hidden for 15 seconds each in a fixed order. This configuration item is used to describe the cycle configuration of a single watermark.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.TranscodeTaskInput.EndTimeOffset
member.summary:
End time offset of a transcoded video, in seconds.
If this parameter is left empty or set to 0, the transcoded video will end at the same time as the original video.
If this parameter is set to a positive number (n for example), the transcoded video will end at the nth second of the original video.
If this parameter is set to a negative number (-n for example), the transcoded video will end at the nth second before the end of the original video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.TranscodeTaskInput.StartTimeOffset
member.summary:
Start time offset of a transcoded video, in seconds.
If this parameter is left empty or set to 0, the transcoded video will start at the same time as the original video.
If this parameter is set to a positive number (n for example), the transcoded video will start at the nth second of the original video.
If this parameter is set to a negative number (-n for example), the transcoded video will start at the nth second before the end of the original video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.TransitionOpertion.Type
member.summary:
Transition type. Valid values:
Video image transition operation, which is used for transition with video image between two video segments:
ImageFadeInFadeOut: video image fade-in/fade-out.
BowTieHorizontal: horizontal bow.
BowTieVertical: vertical bow.
ButterflyWaveScrawler: waggling.
Cannabisleaf: maple leaf.
Circle: curved circling.
CircleCrop: circle gathering.
Circleopen: elliptic gathering.
Crosswarp: horizontal warping.
Cube: cube.
DoomScreenTransition: curtain.
Doorway: doorway.
Dreamy: wave.
DreamyZoom: horizontal gathering.
FilmBurn: evening glow.
GlitchMemories: joggling.
Heart: heart.
InvertedPageCurl: page turning.
Luma: corroding.
Mosaic: grid.
Pinwheel: pinwheel.
PolarFunction: elliptic diffusing.
PolkaDotsCurtain: curved diffusing.
Radial: radar scan.
RotateScaleFade: vertical rotating.
Squeeze: vertical gathering.
Swap: zooming in.
Swirl: swirling.
UndulatingBurnOutSwirl: water spreading.
Windowblinds: blinds.
WipeDown: collapsing down.
WipeLeft: collapsing to the left.
WipeRight: collapsing to the right.
WipeUp: collapsing up.
ZoomInCircles: ripples.
Audio transition operation, which is used for transition between two audio segments:
AudioFadeInFadeOut: audio fade-in/fade-out.

member.name: M:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.TransitionOpertion.ToMap(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String)
member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.Fps
member.summary: Video frame rate in Hz. Value range: [0,100]. If the value is 0, the frame rate will be the same as that of the source video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.Bitrate
member.summary: Bitrate of video stream in Kbps. Value range: 0 and [128, 35,000]. If the value is 0, the bitrate of the video will be the same as that of the source video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.ResolutionAdaptive
P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.Width
member.summary:
The maximum video width (or long side) in pixels. Value range: 0 and [128, 8192].
If both `Width` and `Height` are 0, the output resolution will be the same as that of the source video.
If `Width` is 0 and `Height` is not, the video width will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not 0 and `Height` is, the video height will be proportionally scaled.
If neither `Width` nor `Height` is 0, the specified width and height will be used. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.Height
member.summary:
The maximum video height (or short side) in pixels. Value range: 0 and [128, 8192].
If both `Width` and `Height` are 0, the output resolution will be the same as that of the source video.
If `Width` is 0 and `Height` is not, the video width will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not 0 and `Height` is, the video height will be proportionally scaled.
If neither `Width` nor `Height` is 0, the specified width and height will be used. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.FillType
member.summary:
Fill type, the way of processing a screenshot when the configured aspect ratio is different from that of the source video. Valid values:
stretch: stretches the video image frame by frame to fill the screen. The video image may become "squashed" or "stretched" after transcoding.
black: fills the uncovered area with black color, without changing the image's aspect ratio.
white: fills the uncovered area with white color, without changing the image's aspect ratio.
gauss: applies Gaussian blur to the uncovered area, without changing the image's aspect ratio. Default value: black

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.Gop
member.summary: I-frame interval in frames. Valid values: 0 and 1-100000. When this parameter is set to 0 or left empty, `Gop` will be automatically set.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.PreserveHDRSwitch
member.summary:
Whether to output an HDR (high dynamic range) video if the source video is HDR. Valid values:
ON: If the source video is HDR, output an HDR video; if not, output an SDR (standard dynamic range) video.
OFF: Output an SDR video regardless of whether the source video is HDR. Default value: OFF.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfo.CodecTag
member.summary:
The codec tag. This parameter is valid only if the H.265 codec is used. Valid values:
hvc1
hev1 Default value: hvc1.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.Fps
member.summary: Video frame rate in Hz. Value range: [0,100]. If the value is 0, the frame rate will be the same as that of the source video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.Bitrate
member.summary: Bitrate of video stream in Kbps. Value range: 0 and [128, 35,000]. If the value is 0, the bitrate of the video will be the same as that of the source video.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.ResolutionAdaptive
P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.Width
member.summary:
The maximum video width (or long side) in pixels. Value range: 0 and [128, 8192].
If both `Width` and `Height` are 0, the output resolution will be the same as that of the source video.
If `Width` is 0 and `Height` is not, the video width will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not 0 and `Height` is, the video height will be proportionally scaled.
If neither `Width` nor `Height` is 0, the specified width and height will be used.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.Height
member.summary: The maximum video height (or short side) in pixels. Value range: 0 and [128, 8192].

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.FillType
member.summary:
Fill type. "Fill" refers to the way of processing a screenshot when its aspect ratio is different from that of the source video. Valid values:
stretch: stretches video image frame by frame to fill the screen. The video image may become "squashed" or "stretched" after transcoding.
black: fills the uncovered area with black color, without changing the image's aspect ratio.
white: fills the uncovered area with white color, without changing the image's aspect ratio.
gauss: applies Gaussian blur to the uncovered area, without changing the image's aspect ratio.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTemplateInfoForUpdate.Gop
member.summary: I-frame interval in frames. Valid values: 0 and 1-100000. When this parameter is set to 0 or left empty, `Gop` will be automatically set.

Whether to output an HDR (high dynamic range) video if the source video is HDR. Valid values:
ON: If the source video is HDR, output an HDR video; if not, output an SDR (standard dynamic range) video.
OFF: Output an SDR video regardless of whether the source video is HDR.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.SourceMedia
member.summary:
Source of media material for video segment, which can be:
ID of VOD media files
Download URL of other media files. Note: when a download URL of other media files is used as the material source and access control (such as hotlink protection) is enabled, the URL needs to carry access control parameters (such as hotlink protection signature).

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.SourceMediaStartTime
member.summary: Start time of video segment in material file in seconds. Default value: 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.Duration
member.summary: Video segment duration in seconds. By default, the length of the video material will be used, which means that the entire material will be captured. If the source file is an image, `Duration` needs to be greater than 0.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.TargetDuration
member.summary:
The target video duration, in seconds.
If `TargetDuration` is empty or `0`, the target duration is the same as `Duration`.
If `TargetDuration` is a value greater than 0, the playback speed will be changed to make the final video duration the same as the value of `TargetDuration`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.CoordinateOrigin
member.summary:
Video origin position. Valid values:
Center: the origin of coordinates is the center position, such as the center of canvas. Default value: Center.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.XPos
member.summary:
The horizontal position of the origin of the video segment relative to the origin of the canvas. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `XPos` of the video segment will be at the position of the specified percentage of the canvas width; for example, `10%` means that `XPos` is 10% of the canvas width.
If the string ends in px, the `XPos` of the video segment will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `XPos` is 100 px. Default value: 0 px.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.YPos
member.summary:
The vertical position of the origin of the video segment relative to the origin of the canvas. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `YPos` of the video segment will be at the position of the specified percentage of the canvas height; for example, `10%` means that `YPos` is 10% of the canvas height.
If the string ends in px, the `YPos` of the video segment will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `YPos` is 100 px. Default value: 0 px.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.Width
member.summary:
Video segment width. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `Width` of the video segment will be the specified percentage of the canvas width; for example, `10%` means that `Width` is 10% of the canvas width.
If the string ends in px, the `Width` of the video segment will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `Width` is 100 px.
If both `Width` and `Height` are empty, then they will be the `Width` and `Height` of the video material, respectively.
If `Width` is empty, but `Height` is not empty, `Width` will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not empty, but `Height` is empty, `Height` will be proportionally scaled.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Vod.V20180717.Models.VideoTrackItem.Height
member.summary:
Video segment height. % and px formats are supported:
If the string ends in %, the `Height` of the video segment will be the specified percentage of the canvas height; for example, `10%` means that `Height` is 10% of the canvas height;
If the string ends in px, the `Height` of the video segment will be in px; for example, `100px` means that `Height` is 100 px.
If both `Width` and `Height` are empty, then they will be the `Width` and `Height` of the video material, respectively.
If `Width` is empty, but `Height` is not empty, `Width` will be proportionally scaled.
If `Width` is not empty, but `Height` is empty, `Height` will be proportionally scaled.
